forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 14 to 26 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of clouds embraces the city, a gentle reminder of the shifting moods of coastal weather. The temperature hovers around a cool and comfortable 52 degrees, with a brisk west-southwest breeze whispering at 15 mph, occasionally gusting to 18 mph. The morning light filters through a gauzy layer, hinting at the clarity to come, yet softly muted by the remnants of the marine layer that often graces this part of the coast.

The day ahead promises a transformation as the clouds give way to a predominantly sunny sky. Temperatures will rise, peaking near a delightful 61 degrees, making it ideal for outdoor pursuits after the fog lifts. It would be wise to don layers, perhaps a light jacket or cardigan to start, transitioning into something breezy and light for later in the day. Opportunities abound to meander through the verdant parks or stroll along the waterfront, perhaps enjoying a quiet moment with a book at a local café as the world wakes up. A visit to a farmer's market or a leisurely walk through the streets, admiring the quaint architecture, will bring comfort and cheer on this lovely San Francisco day.
